org.jpac.configuration

Class LongProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpac.configuration.Property
      • org.jpac.configuration.LongProperty

  • public class LongProperty
extends Property
    represents a long property stored inside the hierarchical xml configuration file ./cfg/org.jpac.Configuration.xml if not already present, this property will be automatically stored inside the configuration file on the next save() operation or on exit of the elbfisch application (if property "org.jpac.JPac.StoreConfigOnShutdown = true). If already present, the corresponding entry inside the configuration file is left untouched.

    • Property Summary

      • Properties inherited from class org.jpac.configuration.Property

    • Constructor Detail

      • LongProperty

        public LongProperty(java.lang.Object owningObject,
            java.lang.String key,
            long defaultValue,
            java.lang.String comment,
            boolean classProperty)
             throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        constructs a long property
        Parameters:
        owningObject - the module which instantiated this property. All properties owned by a module are stored under its qualified name inside the configuration file.
        key - the key under which this property is stored inside the hierarchical xml configuration file.
        defaultValue - the value the property earns by default
        comment - a comment describing the purpose of the property
        classProperty - if true, this property is stored under the name of the modules class, instead of its qualified name. It than can be used by all instances of this module class
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - thrown, if an error occurs while accessing the configuration

      • LongProperty

            java.lang.String key,

             throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException

        key - the key under which this property is stored inside the hierarchical xml configuration file.
        defaultValue - the value the property earns by default
        comment - a comment describing the purpose of the property instances of this module class
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - thrown, if an error occurs while accessing the configuration

      • LongProperty

        public LongProperty(java.lang.String key)
             throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        constructs a long property for read only access. The key must be fully qualified to access the property
        Parameters:
        key - the fully qualified key of the property
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - thrown, if an error occurs while accessing the configuration
